text:
The UK Government raised a requirement of 17 million doses to tackle #COVID19 
Out of this 7 million doses will be ready for distribution by spring 2021. Finally, a ray of sunshine! 🌞

#covid #covid19impact #covid19recovery #vaccine #modernavaccine #pfizer #oxfordvaccine #ukgov https://t.co/9rPlI2IrMK
